args.natural_language_statement: Prove that no group of order p^2 * q, where p and q are prime, is simple. Translate to Lean4. End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry. Import Mathlib at the top and save to Artin_exercise_6_4_3.lean.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Exercise (Artin 6.4.3): A group of order p^2 * q (p,q primes) is not simple. -/
theorem Artin_exercise_6_4_3 (p q : ℕ) (hp : Nat.Prime p) (hq : Nat.Prime q) {G : Type*} [Group G] [Fintype G]
  (hcard : Fintype.card G = p ^ 2 * q) : ¬ IsSimpleGroup G := by sorry
